data.title: Sister republic
data.meta_description: A sister republic was a republic established by the French First Republic or by local revolutionaries during the French Revolutionary Wars. These republics, though nominally independent, relied heavily on France for protection, making them more akin to autonomous territories rather than independent states. This became particularly evident after the declaration of the French Empire, when several states were annexed, and the remaining turned into monarchies ruled by members of the Bonaparte family.
data.text:
Client state of France during the French Revolutionary Wars / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
